brief: This command deletes a DHCPv6 option from a subnet from the configuration database.
cmd-comment: This command includes two lists with exactly one ID of the subnet and exactly one option specification, comprising an option name and code. Specifying an empty list, a value of ``null``, or a server tag will result in an error.
cmd-syntax: <specification of the database to connect to>
name: remote-option6-subnet-del
